author: eTN Editor
title: Nevada gambling on increase in Indian tourism
text:
Nevada gambling on increase in Indian tourism   
By Anil Mathur, eTN India Correspondent | Oct 16, 2015 eTN   
INDIA (eTN) - The Nevada Division of Tourism in the USA has appointed Sartha Global as its representative in India. 
The state of Nevada is known for its mountain region, landscape, history, and culture, which will encourage more Indians to go there, feels Sunil Puri, Executive Director of Sartha Marketing. 
Increasing awareness of the destination and interacting with the travel trade to boost arrivals from India will be some ways by which Sartha Global will be working.
